item.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Unveils GPT-5 Controls, Reinstates GPT-4o For ChatGPT Paid Users After Backlash

item.title: Elon Musk's Starlink Direct-To-Cell Passes Ukraine Test, Setting Stage For Nationwide Satellite Smartphone Coverage

item.title: S&P 500 Jumps To Fresh All-Time Highs After Inflation Data: Investor Sentiment Improves, Fear Index Remains In 'Greed' Zone
item.description: U.S. stocks closed higher on Tuesday, with the S&P 500 hitting new record highs after July's inflation data eased fears. Dow up 484 points. read more
